name: Stickman dormitory
description:
You have to find all ways to escape from the hostel.
You are a young man who is tired of living in an old hostel for many years.
Under the couch found a box with various objects. This is your chance to change your life and escape from this hostel.
Choose any subject, but remember that not all items will help you leave the hostel. On the way you will meet evil neighbors who will do everything possible so that you will not leave the walls of the hostel.
You must be bold and considerate, so that your dream comes true, and you live in a normal estate.
Children's graphics and funny animation will delight your eyes.
